page.title: 19Recreation in Rhos
page.content: Football and rugby are the most popular sports in the area.There are several amteur football teams that play in the welsh nationl league,Rhos Aelwyd,Penycae and Johnstown athletic. There are also many other teams that play in the sunday league for pubs and clubs. Since 1983 Rhos has had a rugby team and they have their own pitch just outside the block in Bersham. Bowls and tennis are also popular outdoor sports.The indoor sports includes a quiz league,darts,domminos and pool competitions.There is also a karate club at the Johnsstown community center.
